title: The 10 Best Jo Malone Scents for Every Mood
excerpt: Whether you favor toasty vanillas, bright spring notes, or winter warmth, there's a Jo Malone scent available to match your many moods. Here are the 10 best ones.
text: Best Unisex Scent Jo Malone London Myrrh & Tonka Cologne IntenseCredit: courtesy of brandsKey notes: vanilla, warm almond, lavenderSize 1.7 fl ozThe vibe: Jo Malone whipped up the scent equivalent of the day that transitions fall into winter. It’s still warm and toasty—thanks to the inclusion of tonka beans, vanilla, and tobacco—but the sparkling freshness of winter creeps in with lavender to balance out the woodsy edge.Nordstrom rating: 4.7/5 stars A Nordstrom reviewer said: “This is an intense fragrance that lasts quite a long time. I tried it, kept coming back to it every day I tried it before I decided to purchase. It's not one of the highest priced fragrances but for its price point I had to love it. Definitely try before you purchase, not for everyone.”Best Earthy Scent Jo Malone London Blackberry & Bay CologneCredit: courtesy of brandsKey notes: blackberry, bay leaves, cedarwoodSize: 3.4 fl ozThe vibe: Blackberries in scents, especially those that lean peppery and dark, may be incredibly intimidating. The Blackberry & Bay aroma by Jo Malone is rich and seductive without being overpowering. Your body is warmed by the scent of cedarwood and brambly leaves, which settles into a vibrant freshness.Sephora rating: 4.4/5 stars A Sephora reviewer said: “I will continue to purchase this product. The scent lasts all day. Its clean and not at all overpowering. It layers very well with other Jo Malone scents like EP&F. My husband always compliments me when I wear it.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Fresh ScentJo Malone London Silver Birch & Lavender Cologne Credit: courtesy of brandsKey notes: lavender, grapefruit, silver birchSize: 3.4 fl ozThe vibe: Fill your room with a sense of chill and ease with the Silver Birch and Lavender scent from Jo Malone. It sparkles with citrus and lavender and settles in a woody blend of silver birch and roasted oak. Nordstrom star rating: 4.3/5 stars A Nordstrom reviewer said: “WOW! Just wow! I stopped at a Jo Malone boutique to discover this scent and was BLOWN away! The fragrance card I sprayed last for two days! I immediately jumped on Nordstrom’s site and ordered! I am floored by how lovely and calming this scent is. I hesitated due to the price previously of Jo’s perfumes however I am purchasing another immediately so I can rotate. Try this—you will not be disappointed!”Best Tangy Citrus Scent Jo Malone London Lime Basil & Mandarin Cologne Credit: courtesy of brandsKey notes: amberwood, mandarin, basilSize: 3.4 fl oz The vibe: This comforting concoction smells like what a Caribbean beachside day feels like. Jo Malone melds peppery basil with white thyme and mandarin for a bright burst.Nordstrom star rating: 4.7/5 starsA Nordstrom reviewer said: “As a long time user of Jo Malone products, this is a staple scent in my collection. I like wearing this scent during warmer months. Strangers often stop to ask what fragrance I am wearing. I am stopped so often I feel I should have Jo Malone flyer information to pass out. [The] fragrance stays with you all day yet isn’t overwhelming.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Spicy Floral Jo Malone London Scarlet Poppy Cologne Intense Credit: courtesy of brandsKey notes: vanilla, ambrette tonka beans, poppySize: 1.7 fl oz The vibe: Blooms can be as intense and bold as woods and spices, too. Jo Malone’s iteration immediately hooks you with its deep-red packaging, but a whiff of scarlet poppy, vanilla, and iris, anchored by tonka beans, proves its staying power.Nordstrom rating: 4.4/5 stars Our expert says: “Seeing the word ‘scarlet’ on the bottle told me everything I needed to know about this scent—it’s bold and intense as the color it’s named after. I immediately enjoyed the hint of cherry in this scent. Scarlett Poppy is sexy and slightly floral, but now overpoweringly sweet.”— Nerisha PenroseBest Floral ScentJo Malone London Wild Bluebell CologneKey notes: bluebell, persimmon, white muskSize: 3.4 fl ozThe vibe: Perfect for everyday wear regardless of the season, Wild Bluebell is a floral melange with creamy, powdery undertones. The spicy hook comes courtesy of clove buds and white musk. Sephora rating: 4.5/5 starsA Sephora reviewer said: “This fragrance is simply the best. It’s a great layering fragrance and it’s great on its own. It fades down to a lovely light scent that will not overpower or give the sensitive at heart a headache. Love it.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Springtime ScentJo Malone London Orange Blossom Cologne Key notes: clementine flower, white lilac, orris woodSize: 3.4 fl ozThe vibe: Spring scents are typically stuffed with overpowering floral notes that are more predictable than alluring. Here’s a scent that turns rose, clementine, white lilac, and more into elegant, sparkling blossoms that evoke the feeling of a balmy April morning. Plus, it’s Kate Middleton’s favorite.Nordstrom star rating: 4.5/5 starsA Nordstrom reviewer said: “I don’t even like perfume but I love this one. It is fresh and invigorating, like a stroll through an orange orchard. Perfect for California...or for someone who wants to be transported to a sunny place. A little is all you need.”Best Oceanic Scent Jo Malone London Wood Sage & Sea Salt CologneKey notes: sage, sea salt, ambrette Size: 3.4 fl ozThe vibe: If you long for the feeling of wet sand between your toes, salty seawater dripping from your hair, and a gentle wind cooling you down, this smell allows you to relive that experience with every spritz. It is also the scent Sofia Richie Grainge wore on her wedding day.Nordstrom star rating: 4.5/5 starsA Nordstrom reviewer said: “This scent is so lovely! It can be worn by anyone and is so refreshing, I do wish it stayed put a while longer but the fragrance is by far the best and doesn’t feel heavy like some perfumes or colognes. My entire family wears it, so I would have to say it’s our Signature go to! Try it, you will love it!!”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Juicy Floral Scent Jo Malone London English Pear & Freesia CologneKey notes: william pear, freesia, patchouliSize: 3.4 fl ozThe vibe: This scent blends the juiciest pear with a fresh white freesias, patchouli, and woods that keeps you smelling delicious—but in a mature way—all day long. Sephora rating: 4.2/5 stars A Sephora reviewer said: “This cologne is very gentle and light. It smells sweet, not in a heavy way. You can smell the roses and the sweet notes of fresh pears, so yummy :)”Why Trust ELLE Beauty? Nerisha Penrose is the Beauty Commerce Editor at ELLE.com. Since joining ELLE.com in 2017, she has interviewed countless beauty professionals and has personally tested the latest and greatest fragrances. In 2022, Penrose was nominated for a Fragrance Foundation Award for her coverage of Spell On You by Louis Vuitton.
html:
Best Unisex Scent

Jo Malone London Myrrh & Tonka Cologne Intense

Key notes: vanilla, warm almond, lavender

Size 1.7 fl oz

The vibe: Jo Malone whipped up the scent equivalent of the day that transitions fall into winter. It’s still warm and toasty—thanks to the inclusion of tonka beans, vanilla, and tobacco—but the sparkling freshness of winter creeps in with lavender to balance out the woodsy edge.

Nordstrom rating: 4.7/5 stars

A Nordstrom reviewer said: “This is an intense fragrance that lasts quite a long time. I tried it, kept coming back to it every day I tried it before I decided to purchase. It's not one of the highest priced fragrances but for its price point I had to love it. Definitely try before you purchase, not for everyone.”

Best Earthy Scent

Jo Malone London Blackberry & Bay Cologne

Key notes: blackberry, bay leaves, cedarwood

Size: 3.4 fl oz

The vibe: Blackberries in scents, especially those that lean peppery and dark, may be incredibly intimidating. The Blackberry & Bay aroma by Jo Malone is rich and seductive without being overpowering. Your body is warmed by the scent of cedarwood and brambly leaves, which settles into a vibrant freshness.

Sephora rating: 4.4/5 stars

A Sephora reviewer said: “I will continue to purchase this product. The scent lasts all day. Its clean and not at all overpowering. It layers very well with other Jo Malone scents like EP&F. My husband always compliments me when I wear it.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Fresh Scent

Jo Malone London Silver Birch & Lavender Cologne

Key notes: lavender, grapefruit, silver birch

Size: 3.4 fl oz

The vibe: Fill your room with a sense of chill and ease with the Silver Birch and Lavender scent from Jo Malone. It sparkles with citrus and lavender and settles in a woody blend of silver birch and roasted oak.

Nordstrom star rating: 4.3/5 stars

A Nordstrom reviewer said: “WOW! Just wow! I stopped at a Jo Malone boutique to discover this scent and was BLOWN away! The fragrance card I sprayed last for two days! I immediately jumped on Nordstrom’s site and ordered! I am floored by how lovely and calming this scent is. I hesitated due to the price previously of Jo’s perfumes however I am purchasing another immediately so I can rotate. Try this—you will not be disappointed!”

Best Tangy Citrus Scent

Jo Malone London Lime Basil & Mandarin Cologne

Key notes: amberwood, mandarin, basil

Size: 3.4 fl oz

The vibe: This comforting concoction smells like what a Caribbean beachside day feels like. Jo Malone melds peppery basil with white thyme and mandarin for a bright burst.

Nordstrom star rating: 4.7/5 stars

A Nordstrom reviewer said: “As a long time user of Jo Malone products, this is a staple scent in my collection. I like wearing this scent during warmer months. Strangers often stop to ask what fragrance I am wearing. I am stopped so often I feel I should have Jo Malone flyer information to pass out. [The] fragrance stays with you all day yet isn’t overwhelming.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Spicy Floral

Jo Malone London Scarlet Poppy Cologne Intense

Key notes: vanilla, ambrette tonka beans, poppy

Size: 1.7 fl oz

The vibe: Blooms can be as intense and bold as woods and spices, too. Jo Malone’s iteration immediately hooks you with its deep-red packaging, but a whiff of scarlet poppy, vanilla, and iris, anchored by tonka beans, proves its staying power.

Nordstrom rating: 4.4/5 stars

Our expert says: “Seeing the word ‘scarlet’ on the bottle told me everything I needed to know about this scent—it’s bold and intense as the color it’s named after. I immediately enjoyed the hint of cherry in this scent. Scarlett Poppy is sexy and slightly floral, but now overpoweringly sweet.”— Nerisha Penrose

Best Floral Scent

Jo Malone London Wild Bluebell Cologne

Key notes: bluebell, persimmon, white musk

Size: 3.4 fl oz

The vibe: Perfect for everyday wear regardless of the season, Wild Bluebell is a floral melange with creamy, powdery undertones. The spicy hook comes courtesy of clove buds and white musk.

Sephora rating: 4.5/5 stars

A Sephora reviewer said: “This fragrance is simply the best. It’s a great layering fragrance and it’s great on its own. It fades down to a lovely light scent that will not overpower or give the sensitive at heart a headache. Love it.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Springtime Scent

Jo Malone London Orange Blossom Cologne

Key notes: clementine flower, white lilac, orris wood

Size: 3.4 fl oz

The vibe: Spring scents are typically stuffed with overpowering floral notes that are more predictable than alluring. Here’s a scent that turns rose, clementine, white lilac, and more into elegant, sparkling blossoms that evoke the feeling of a balmy April morning. Plus, it’s Kate Middleton’s favorite.

Nordstrom star rating: 4.5/5 stars

A Nordstrom reviewer said: “I don’t even like perfume but I love this one. It is fresh and invigorating, like a stroll through an orange orchard. Perfect for California...or for someone who wants to be transported to a sunny place. A little is all you need.”

Best Oceanic Scent

Jo Malone London Wood Sage & Sea Salt Cologne

Key notes: sage, sea salt, ambrette

Size: 3.4 fl oz

The vibe: If you long for the feeling of wet sand between your toes, salty seawater dripping from your hair, and a gentle wind cooling you down, this smell allows you to relive that experience with every spritz. It is also the scent Sofia Richie Grainge wore on her wedding day.

Nordstrom star rating: 4.5/5 stars

A Nordstrom reviewer said: “This scent is so lovely! It can be worn by anyone and is so refreshing, I do wish it stayed put a while longer but the fragrance is by far the best and doesn’t feel heavy like some perfumes or colognes. My entire family wears it, so I would have to say it’s our Signature go to! Try it, you will love it!!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Juicy Floral Scent

Jo Malone London English Pear & Freesia Cologne

Key notes: william pear, freesia, patchouli

Size: 3.4 fl oz

The vibe: This scent blends the juiciest pear with a fresh white freesias, patchouli, and woods that keeps you smelling delicious—but in a mature way—all day long.

Sephora rating: 4.2/5 stars

A Sephora reviewer said: “This cologne is very gentle and light. It smells sweet, not in a heavy way. You can smell the roses and the sweet notes of fresh pears, so yummy :)”

Why Trust ELLE Beauty?

Nerisha Penrose is the Beauty Commerce Editor at ELLE.com. Since joining ELLE.com in 2017, she has interviewed countless beauty professionals and has personally tested the latest and greatest fragrances. In 2022, Penrose was nominated for a Fragrance Foundation Award for her coverage of Spell On You by Louis Vuitton.
